metadata.title: CVE-2023-4154 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A design flaw was found in Samba's DirSync control implementation, whichexposes passwords and secrets in Active Directory to privileged users andRead-Only Domain Controllers (RODCs). This flaw allows RODCs and userspossessing the GET_CHANGES right to access all attributes, includingsensitive secrets and passwords. Even in a default setup, RODC DC accounts,which should only replicate some passwords, can gain access to all domainsecrets, including the vital krbtgt, effectively eliminating the RODC / DCdistinction. Furthermore, the vulnerability fails to account for errorconditions (fail open), like out-of-memory situations, potentially grantingaccess to secret attributes, even under low-privileged attacker influence.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4154` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ctdb - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
libnss-winbind - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
libpam-winbind - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
libsmbclient - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
libwbclient0 - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
python3-samba - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
registry-tools - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-ad-dc - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-ad-provision - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-common - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-common-bin - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-dsdb-modules - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-libs - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-testsuite - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
samba-vfs-modules - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
smbclient - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
winbind - 2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
ldb-tools - 2:2.6.2+samba4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
libldb2 - 2:2.6.2+samba4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
python3-ldb - 2:2.6.2+samba4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: samba package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3').
samba package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:4.17.7+dfsg-1ubuntu2.3').
